name: SantaTracker
0:
”Alexa ask Santa Tracker where is Santa”
”Alexa ask Santa Tracker where's Santa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa tracker
des: This skill provides updates on where Santa is. Keep asking before Christmas Eve and Santa will be in the North Pole doing various jobs. On Christmas Eve, ask Santa Tracker and Alexa will update you where Santa and his sleigh are in the world at that point in time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
